main event: A UFO sighting occurred on June 26, 1965, in Sturgis, Michigan, observed by one civilian for 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as a small red and blue object sighted moving in a horizontal flight path without changing size or elevation., A bright white light was observed to the right of the flight path., The object's course was noted as NE-NE., No physical evidence was found from the sighting., The report mentioned possible explanations such as a beacon from an F/C tanker or a jet airway.
